name: Edible Berries
description: A cluster of ripe, juicy berries suitable for consumption.

name: Medicinal Herbs
description: A collection of herbs known for their healing properties when brewed into teas or poultices.

name: Mushrooms
description: Various types of mushrooms, some edible, some poisonous. Requires proper identification.

name: Wild Game
description: Freshly caught small game such as rabbits or squirrels, suitable for cooking.

name: Fresh Water Source
description: A pristine stream or natural spring providing clean drinking water.

name: Edible Roots
description: Various roots and tubers that can be dug up and cooked for sustenance.

name: Nuts
description: Assorted nuts from trees, a good source of protein and energy.

name: Wildflowers
description: A bouquet of colorful wildflowers, beautiful and potentially useful for herbalism or attracting insects.

name: Insect Hive
description: A hive of bees or wasps, providing honey or larvae for consumption. Approach with caution.

name: Edible Fungi
description: Different varieties of fungi suitable for consumption.
